title: Super serious ranked team
body:
I am creating a serious ranked team, requirements are:
Must be a frequent player
Must be silver or higher
If you are interested leave a comment about what role you want and your ign name so I know who to add, if you have any questions feel free to ask :)

replies.body: Ok my internet is back and running I will add you guys tonight
Sweet it looks like I'll top, ok the team is full we will Skype or something and I will add you guys when my net comes back so after 5pm on weekdays I will message you guys

In Game Name: Lexhanatin
Role: Adc > Jungle/Mid > Support/Top
I will add you to the team when my net comes back

IGN: YY90001 KonKi
Role: Sup only
I will add you as soon as my net comes back which will be either tomorrow or Wednesday
